fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-At night, have someone interpret your art
-They may interpret it as 3 things
A) A dayvigi’s gun
B) a man stressed because he’s roleblocked
C) a powerful heal

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will know which one of these options your target chose.
This is what happens if your target chose one of these:

fields.name: A dayvigi’s gun:
fields.value: You will shoot your target. The death will appear to be from a random attacking role

fields.name: A man stressed because he’s roleblocked:
fields.value: You will roleblock your target twice in a row. Anyone that visited your target the first night will be roleblocked the second

fields.name: A powerful heal:
fields.value:
You will heal yourself and a random Unseen member

If you shoot an unseen member somehow, the dayvigi’s gun will become “Suicidal Ideation”

fields.name: Suicidal Ideation:
fields.value: Your target will be the only person that can be voted for the next day
